verses.english: Exalt the name of your Lord, the Most High,
verses.hausa: Ka tsarkake sũnan Ubangijinka Mafi ɗaukaka.
Wanda Yã yi halitta sa'an nan Ya daidaita abin halittar.
Kuma Wanda Ya ƙaddara (abin da Ya so) sannan Ya shiryar, (da mutum ga hanyar alhẽri da ta sharri).

verses.english: And who brings out the pasture
verses.hausa: Kuma Wanda Ya fitar da makiyãyã.
Sa'an nan Ya mayar da ita ƙeƙasassa, baƙa.

verses.english: We will make you recite, [O Muhammad], and you will not forget,
verses.hausa: Za mu karantar da kai (Alƙur'ãni) sabõda haka bã zã ka mantã (shi) ba.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ يَعْلَمُ ٱلْجَهْرَ وَمَا يَخْفَىٰ
verses.english: Except what Allah should will. Indeed, He knows what is declared and what is hidden.
verses.hausa: Fãce abin da Allah Ya so, lalle ne Shi (Allah) Ya san bayyane da abin da yake bõye.

verses.english: And We will ease you toward ease.
verses.hausa: Kuma za Mu sauƙaƙe maka (al'amari) zuwa ga (Shari'a) mai sauƙi.

verses.english: So remind, if the reminder should benefit;
verses.hausa: Sabõda baka, ka tunãtar, idan tunatarwa zã ta yi amfãni.

verses.english: He who fears [Allah] will be reminded.
But the wretched one will avoid it -
[He] who will [enter and] burn in the greatest Fire,
verses.hausa: Wanda zai shiga wutar da tã fi girma.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَىٰ
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan bã zai mutu ba a cikinta, kuma bã zai rãyu ba.

verses.english: He has certainly succeeded who purifies himself
verses.hausa: Lalle ne wanda ya tsarkaka (da ĩmãni) yã sãmu babban rabo.

verses.english: And mentions the name of his Lord and prays.
verses.hausa: Kuma ya ambaci sũnan Ubangijinsa, sa'an nan yã yi salla.

verses.english: But you prefer the worldly life,
verses.hausa: Ba haka ba! Kunã zãɓin rãyuwa ta kusa dũniya.

verses.english: While the Hereafter is better and more enduring.
verses.hausa: Alhãli Lãhira ita ce mafi alheri kuma mafi wanzuwa.

verses.english: Indeed, this is in the former scriptures,
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, wannan yanã a cikin littafan farko.

verses.english: The scriptures of Abraham and Moses.
